name: url-redirection-tracking
description: Serverless URL redirection and tracking application

scripts.build:clean: npm run clean && npm run build
scripts.build:lambdas: npm run build:clean && npm run package:lambdas
scripts.package:lambdas: npm run package:redirection && npm run package:analytics && npm run package:dlq-processor
scripts.package:redirection: mkdir -p dist/lambdas/redirection && cp package.json dist/lambdas/redirection/ && mkdir -p dist/lambdas/redirection/shared && cp -r dist/shared/* dist/lambdas/redirection/shared/ 2>/dev/null || true
scripts.package:analytics: mkdir -p dist/lambdas/analytics && cp package.json dist/lambdas/analytics/ && mkdir -p dist/lambdas/analytics/shared && cp -r dist/shared/* dist/lambdas/analytics/shared/ 2>/dev/null || true
scripts.package:dlq-processor: mkdir -p dist/lambdas/dlq-processor && cp package.json dist/lambdas/dlq-processor/ && mkdir -p dist/lambdas/dlq-processor/shared && cp -r dist/shared/* dist/lambdas/dlq-processor/shared/ 2>/dev/null || true
scripts.package: npm run build:clean && npm run test
scripts.deploy: npm run build:lambdas && cdk deploy --profile primary
scripts.cdk:synth: npm run build:lambdas && cdk synth --profile primary
scripts.cdk:diff: npm run build:lambdas && cdk diff --profile primary
scripts.load-test:report: artillery run --output report.json src/load-tests/load-test-config.yml -e production && artillery report --output load-test-report.html report.json
scripts.load-test:analyze: artillery run --output report.json src/load-tests/load-test-config.yml -e production && node src/load-tests/analyze-results.js report.json
scripts.load-test:validate: npm run load-test:analyze && echo 'Performance validation complete'
scripts.load-test:cleanup: rm -f report.json load-test-report.html && echo 'Cleaned up load test artifacts'
